# Friends {#friends}

```{r, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(twinetverse)

TK <- readRDS("twitter_token.rds")
```

In this chapter we briefly go over ego networks with twinetverse. Ego networks are graphs of a focal node.

```{r, warning=FALSE}
tl <- rtweet::get_timeline("jdatap", n = 25)

net <- tl %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(src = "jdatap") %>% 
  gt_edges(text, src, status_id) %>% 
  gt_nodes() %>% 
  gt_collect()

library(zeallot)

c(edges, nodes) %<-% net

edges <- edges %>% 
  dplyr::count(source, target) %>%
  edges2sg()

nodes <- nodes2sg(nodes)

sigmajs() %>% 
  sg_nodes(nodes, id, label, size) %>% 
  sg_edges(edges, source, target, id) %>% 
  sg_layout() %>% 
  sg_settings(
    defaultNodeColor = "#1dcaff",
    edgeColor = "default",
    defaultEdgeColor = "#d3d3d3",
    labelThreshold = 1
  )
```
